remarks: Part of proof of part 12 in [Baer] p. 49 line 3.  (Contributed by NM, 22-May-2015.)
statement:
hdmap12a.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hdmap12a.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmap12a.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
hdmap12a.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` U ) $.
hdmap12a.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmap12a.q $e |- Q = ( 0g ` C ) $.
hdmap12a.s $e |- S = ( ( HDMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmap12a.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hdmap12a.x $e |- ( ph -> T e. V ) $.
hdmapeq0 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( S ` T ) = Q <-> T = .0. ) ) $.
